Muthiga bụ ónyé Africa na-ahụ màkà nchekwa anụmanụ bụ ónyé nduzi nkè Western Indian Ocean Marine Science Association Marine Programme na Kenya
Ọ bụ ónyé sayensị na-ahụ màkà nchekwa maka Wildlife Conservation Society.

A mụrụ Muthiga na Kenya, ma nọrọ akụkụ nkè ógè Nwatakịrị ya na Dar es Salaam. O nwetara akara ugo mmụta ya na biological oceanography na United States. Ọ gụsịrị nzèrè masta ya na Mahadum Steeti Florida, ebe ọ mụrụ mmetụta nke salinity na photosynthesis nke Siderastrea siderea
Muthiga laghachiri Kenya màkà nyocha doctoral ya, ebe ọ sonyeere Mahadum Nairobi.
N'afọ 2000, a họpụtara Muthiga ka ọ bụrụ ónyé isi óche nke Western Indian Ocean Marine Science Association Board of Trustees (WIOMSA)

Ọ lekọtara uto nke WIMOSA na mba ụwa, na-ewu isi na netwọk mpaghara. Muthiga rụrụ ọrụ màkà Kenya Wildlife Service ebe ọ duziri mmemme osimiri na ala mmiri. N'ọrụ a, e mèrè Muthiga ónyé isi oche nke mmemme nchekwa Turtle nke Kenya Sea. Ọ rụrụ ọrụ iji nyochaa ọtụtụ narị coral reefs dị íchè íchè na Western Indian Ocean.

Muthiga bụ ónyé guzobere mmemme coral reef nke Wildlife Conservation Society, nké na-eme nchọpụta ma na-etinye mmemme ndị nwèrè ike ichekwa coral reifs, yana ịchọpụta ụzọ ọhụrụ iji kwe ka ụdị dị oke egwu gbakee. Ihe omume ahụ na-enyere aka ichebe 90% nke ụdị coral nke ụwa ma nyochaa ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ otu puku ebe gafee Indo-Pacific na Oké Osimiri Caribbean. N'afọ 2007, Muthiga sonyeere World Commission on Protected Areas dị ka onye nhazi Kenya. O kwuru na iji chekwaa coral reefs, ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na gbụrụ-gbúrụ ébé obibi ga-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ. O kwenyere na oroma-lined triggerfish nwèrè ike ịrụ ọrụ dị mkpa n'ịnọgide na-enwe corals ahụike.

E nyère Muthiga 2018 Banovich Wildscapes Foundation Award for Conservation Excellence (ACE) màkà ọrụ ya na nchekwa oké osimiri. Na 2020 Eco Magazine kpọrọ Muthiga dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-eme nchọpụta kachasị elu n'ụwa.
Muthiga lụrụ onye America na-ahụ màkà ihe ndị dị ndụ n'oké osimiri bụ Timothy McClanahan. Ọ zutere ya n'afọ 1980, mgbè McClanahan nọ na mmemme ọmụmụ mba ofesi na Kenya.
